daily-vices.title: We Talk Stand-Up with Hannibal Buress on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: We grabbed lunch with the comedian and had a chat about his new special, Comedy Camisado.

daily-vices.title: We Visit the Birthplace of Miami Punk Rock on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: Then Motherboard asks if ISIS's rise could be influenced by solar cycles, and Munchies highlights chef Ronnie Killen's new gourmet spin on traditional Texas BBQ.

daily-vices.title: Meet the LA Organization Specializing in Gang-Tattoo Removal on Today’s 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: We head to Homeboy Industries in Los Angeles, where former gang members go to remove their tattoos as a first step toward changing the direction of their lives.

daily-vices.title: We Check Out a Valentine's Day Kissing Booth in Times Square on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: Then we venture to an abandoned trolley terminal to get a glimpse of New York City's first underground garden and i-D talks to Erykah Badu about her upcoming fashion show.

daily-vices.title: We Go Behind the Scenes of the Bay Area’s Fight Against Sex Trafficking on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: Then we revisit the unsolved case of a chlorine gas attack at a 2014 furry convention in Illinois and Motherboard investigates the decline of AM radio.

daily-vices.title: Designer Robert Geller Talks the Future of Men's Fashion on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: Then we crash an extravagant Chinese wedding in Shanghai with MUNCHIES and explore the rise of electronic music in Cuba.

daily-vices.title: We Meet a Scientist Creating Prosthetic Pinkies for Ex-Yakuza Members on 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: We also sit down with activist Leon Ford Jr., a man fighting for reform after being shot and paralyzed by Pittsburgh police.

daily-vices.title: We Travel to the Center of the Transcendental Meditation Movement on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: Then we hear about the cross-cultural street art festival POW! WOW! and the journey Malta's tallest man took to the NBA.

daily-vices.title: We Meet a 'Serial' Fan Who Quit His Job to Investigate Crimes on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: We talk to a fire chief who became so obsessed with the Serial podcast that he gave up his career to investigate Adnan Syed's case—and other alleged wrongful convictions—full-time.

daily-vices.title: We Meet Trump's Biggest Female Fans on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: Then director Todd Haynes talks about his new film Carol​, and we explore the power of indifference on social media.

daily-vices.title: Watch 'Empire' Star Jussie Smollett Talk About Social Change on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: Then, Motherboard heads to Austin to see if Elon Musk's Hyperloop is any closer to becoming a reality and we investigate the deep-breathing workshops that are supposed to induce trance-like states.

daily-vices.title: We Meet a Wealthy Trump Supporter Trying to Sway the Election on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: VICE's culture editor James Yeh travels to his hometown of Anderson, South Carolina, to investigate how one businessman and outspoken Donald Trump supporter is trying to influence this year's election.

daily-vices.title: We Go Bird Hunting with Environmental Conservationists on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: On today's episode, we head out to Iowa right before the caucus to tag along with some female bird hunters who also consider themselves to be conservationists.

daily-vices.title: Watch an Excerpt from Our New Episode of 'The Real' on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: On today's episode we introduce you to a real defense attorney straight out of the Breaking Bad spinoff Better Call Saul.

daily-vices.title: Actress Tessa Thompson Talks Race in Hollywood on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: Then we meet a guy who's becoming an authority on Mexican baseball without watching any of the games.

daily-vices.title: We Meet a Guy Photographing Every Town in Iowa on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: Photographer Cody Weber wants to foster state pride by capturing the beauty of all 947 towns in Iowa.

daily-vices.title: We Check Out Denver's Weed Wedding Expo on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: We also learn about the DIY internet network that could disrupt major providers and visit the Australian bar that really loves George Costanza.

daily-vices.title: We Join Blackout for Human Rights' MLK Celebration on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: We also hear the story of a handball prodigy who overcame addiction to be one of the country's best players and find out what presidential candidates alien hunters will be voting for in 2016.

daily-vices.title: We Continue Our Look at the Bail Industry on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: We also hear about Noisey's new weekly roll call of emerging artists and discuss how the men's beauty market of South Korea could open a relatively new frontier of men's fashion in the West.

daily-vices.title: We Meet a Teen Who Got $500,000 Bail for a Broken Window on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: Then we meet Arthur Brand, a detective who operates within the black market of art, and hear about the surprising new album from Agoraphobic Nosebleed.

daily-vices.title: We Meet the King of Baltimore Bail Bonds on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: We also discuss the prospects of human hibernation and get culinary career advice from French legend Jacques Pépin.

daily-vices.title: We Remember Actor Alan Rickman on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: We also visit an LGBT church in Texas to find out why Houston doesn't have an equal rights protection ordinance and take a look at Michael Bay's career in light of his latest film.

daily-vices.title: We Visit the Museum of Feelings on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: We also see what life is like at the Traumatic Brain Injury Recovery Center and meet a pro skater who's also an art historian.

daily-vices.title: We See How Art Has Changed the Lives of Haitian Orphans on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: We also visit the studio of the amazing artist Katie Stout and meet the Taiwanese punk rapper who has become Grimes's new best friend.

daily-vices.title: The World Mourns the Loss of David Bowie on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: We pay homage to the Thin White Duke with special reports from the makeshift vigils and parties thrown in his honor in New York and London.

daily-vices.title: We Check Out LA's Uber for Gyms on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: We also investigate the world of captive cheetah breeding and examine how Ecuador's shrimp industry could once again be ravaged by the devastating weather of El Niño.

daily-vices.title: We Investigate the History of Voguing on Today's Episode of 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: Then Broadly tells us what they see on the horizon for women's issues in 2016.

daily-vices.title: We Meet Up with Bun B in Today's Episode of 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: Also, Noisey editors drop their predictions on us for 2016's musical landscape.

daily-vices.title: We Meet One of Thailand's Transgender Beauty Pageant Contestants on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: VICE's Isobel Yeung heads to Thailand to see how the country's attitudes toward trans people are changing.

daily-vices.title: We Investigate How Thailand Is Leading the Charge for Trans Acceptance on Today's 'Daily VICE'
daily-vices.dek: Motherboard's Derek Mead also gives us his predictions for science and tech in 2016.
